variable.name: l2.i
variable.comment: Current flowing from pin p to pin n

variable.name: l2.v
variable.comment: Voltage drop of the two pins (= p.v - n.v)

variable.name: st.inact.tau
variable.comment: time constant for obtaining steady state (i.e. time until difference between n and steady has reduced by a factor of 1/e)

variable.name: st.inact.steady
variable.comment: steady state achieved if current voltage is held constant

variable.name: st.inact.beta
variable.comment: rate of transfer from open to closed conformation

variable.name: st.inact.alpha
variable.comment: rate of transfer from closed to open conformation

variable.name: st.inact.n
variable.comment: ratio of molecules in open conformation

variable.name: st.act.tau
variable.comment: time constant for obtaining steady state (i.e. time until difference between n and steady has reduced by a factor of 1/e)

variable.name: st.act.steady
variable.comment: value that n would reach if v_gate was held constant

variable.name: st.act.n
variable.comment: ratio of molecules in open conformation

variable.name: vc.tp_last
variable.comment: time stamp of start of last pulse

variable.name: vc.peak_indicator
variable.comment: forces event at peak (factor of 1e12 is required to detect zero crossing)

variable.name: vc.vs_tail
variable.comment: steady step function of pulse associated with is_tail

variable.name: vc.vs_end
variable.comment: steady step function of pulse associated with is_end

variable.name: vc.vs_peak
variable.comment: steady step function of pulse associated with is_peak

variable.name: vc.is_end
variable.comment: steady step function of current at end of last pulse

variable.name: vc.is_tail
variable.comment: steady step function of peak tail current after last pulse

variable.name: vc.is_peak
variable.comment: steady step function of peak current during last pulse

variable.name: vc.v_pulse
variable.comment: voltage during pulse (must be defined externally)

variable.name: $whenCondition3
variable.comment: vc.peak_indicator <> pre(vc.peak_indicator) and vc.after_pulse or vc.pulse_end

variable.name: $whenCondition4
variable.comment: vc.peak_indicator <> pre(vc.peak_indicator) and vc.within_pulse or vc.pulse_end

variable.name: l2.use_init
variable.comment: determines whether initial value for v is used

variable.name: st.i
variable.comment: Current flowing from pin p to pin n

variable.name: st.v
variable.comment: Voltage drop of the two pins (= p.v - n.v)

variable.name: vc.stim.i
variable.comment: Current flowing from pin p to pin n

variable.name: vc.stim.v
variable.comment: Voltage between pin p and n (= p.v - n.v) as input signal

variable.name: vc.v_stim
variable.comment: input voltage (needs to be defined externally)

variable.name: vc.v
variable.comment: Voltage drop of the two pins (= p.v - n.v)

equations.equation:
vc.g.p.i + vc.i - vc.n.i = 0.0
vc.g.p.i
vc.i
vc.n.i
0.0

l2.i + st.i_ion - vc.i = 0.0
l2.i
st.i_ion
vc.i
0.0

vc.n.i + (-st.i_ion) - l2.i = 0.0
vc.n.i
st.i_ion
l2.i
0.0

l2.v = /*Real*/(vc.pulse_signal) * (vc.v_pulse - vc.v_hold) + vc.v_hold
l2.v
vc.pulse_signal
vc.v_pulse
vc.v_hold
vc.v_hold

der(st.act.n) = (st.act.steady - st.act.n) / st.act.tau
st.act.n
st.act.steady
st.act.n
st.act.tau

der(st.inact.n) = st.inact.alpha * (1.0 - st.inact.n) - st.inact.beta * st.inact.n
st.inact.n
st.inact.alpha
1.0
st.inact.n
st.inact.beta
st.inact.n

st.open_ratio = st.act.n * st.inact.n
st.open_ratio
st.act.n
st.inact.n

st.i_open = st.g_max * (l2.v - st.v_eq)
st.i_open
st.g_max
l2.v
st.v_eq

st.i_ion = st.open_ratio * st.i_open
st.i_ion
st.open_ratio
st.i_open

der(l2.v) = l2.i / l2.c
l2.v
l2.i
l2.c

vc.pulse_start = sample(1, vc.d_hold, vc.d_hold + vc.d_pulse)
vc.pulse_start
1
vc.d_hold
vc.d_hold
vc.d_pulse

vc.pulse_end = sample(2, vc.d_hold + vc.d_pulse, vc.d_hold + vc.d_pulse)
vc.pulse_end
2
vc.d_hold
vc.d_pulse
vc.d_hold
vc.d_pulse

vc.peak_indicator = der(vc.i) * 1000000000000.0 < 0.0
vc.peak_indicator
vc.i
1000000000000.0
0.0

vc.within_pulse = time - pre(vc.tp_last) < vc.d_pulse
vc.within_pulse
time
vc.tp_last
vc.d_pulse

vc.after_pulse = time - pre(vc.tp_last) > vc.d_pulse
vc.after_pulse
time
vc.tp_last
vc.d_pulse

st.g = st.open_ratio * st.g_max
st.g
st.open_ratio
st.g_max

st.act.steady = InaMo.Examples.ComponentTests.SustainedInwardIV.st.act.fsteady(l2.v, 0.0, 1.0, -0.0491, 111.358574610245, 1.0, 1.0, 1.0)
st.act.steady

0.0

st.act.tau = InaMo.Examples.ComponentTests.SustainedInwardIV.st.act.ftau(l2.v, 0.0)
st.act.tau
l2.v
0.0

st.inact.alpha = InaMo.Examples.ComponentTests.SustainedInwardIV.st.inact.falpha(l2.v, 0.0)
st.inact.alpha
l2.v
0.0

st.inact.beta = InaMo.Examples.ComponentTests.SustainedInwardIV.st.inact.fbeta(l2.v)
st.inact.beta
l2.v

st.inact.steady = st.inact.alpha / (st.inact.alpha + st.inact.beta)
st.inact.steady
st.inact.alpha
st.inact.alpha
st.inact.beta

st.inact.tau = 1.0 / (st.inact.alpha + st.inact.beta)
st.inact.tau
1.0

st.inact.beta

$whenCondition1 = vc.pulse_end

vc.pulse_end

$whenCondition2 = vc.pulse_start
$whenCondition2
vc.pulse_start

$whenCondition3 = vc.peak_indicator <> pre(vc.peak_indicator) and vc.after_pulse or vc.pulse_end
$whenCondition3
vc.peak_indicator
vc.peak_indicator
vc.after_pulse
vc.pulse_end

$whenCondition4 = vc.peak_indicator <> pre(vc.peak_indicator) and vc.within_pulse or vc.pulse_end
